name: Offroad Monster Truck 2018
description: Offroad Monster Truck 2018 game drive real cargo truck on the adventurous roads in mountains. Full realistic mountains environment with adventurous roads is here to have real time truck driving on different hill stations in mountains. Let's sit on the cargo truck, fasten your seat belt, load cargo on grand truck, start your journey from truck stand and transport on different hill stations. Provide free cargo service and learn how to drive modern truck in mountains.
